changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.job_chronology ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Unique identifier job bigint NOT NULL, -- The Job whose chronology is being specified time_stamp timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The time at which a status change occurs status bigint NOT NULL, -- The status the job changed to at the specified time notes character varying NOT NULL, -- Indicates any additional information about the status change updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The agency that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The date this rule was last changed sequence bigint NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT job_chronology_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT job_chronology_job_fkey FOREIGN KEY (job) REFERENCES ruleform.job (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT job_chronology_status_fkey FOREIGN KEY (status) REFERENCES ruleform.status_code (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT job_chronology_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT job_chronology_job_sequence_key UNIQUE (job , sequence ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); ALTER TABLE ruleform.job_chronology ALTER COLUMN sequence SET DEFAULT NEXTVAL('ruleform.job_chronology_seq'); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.job_chronology IS 'Tracks when status changes occur on any given job'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_chronology.id IS 'Unique identifier'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_chronology.job IS 'The Job whose chronology is being specified'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_chronology.time_stamp IS 'The time at which a status change occurs'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_chronology.status IS 'The status the job changed to at the specified time'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_chronology.notes IS 'Indicates any additional information about the status change'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_chronology.updated_by IS 'The agency that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.job_chronology.update_date IS 'The date this rule was last changed';
